inclusion.criterion: Clinical diagnosis of stage 2-5 Chronic Kidney Disease (estimated glomerular filtration rate [GFR] between 15 and < 90 ml/min/1.73m2) based on the new bedside Schwartz formula estimation using serum creatinine and height
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willingness and ability to provide informed consent and assent
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Children less than 1 year of age (in whom risk of vitamin D toxicity may be increased)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Current pregnancy or pregnancy within the last 12 months
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has chronic kidney disease, is between 1-21 years of age, and does not have any exclusion criteria. However, pregnancy status is unknown.
